## Batch section confluencepro.howToMigrate.batch.title=Create or copy batches to import multiple Confluence exports confluencemigratorpro.baches.section.hint=Alternatively, select from below a batch to copy and start from it. All its migrations will be copied and you will be able to review and tweak them, and then run the batch.
